name: Styled Calendar – Customizable, Mobile Responsive Google Calendar Embeds
author: Styled Calendar

sections.description:
Styled Calendar allows you to display up-to-date events from your Google Calendars, fully customize styles, and support desktop and mobile devices, all in just a few clicks.

🚀 Dead Simple Setup

Connect your Google Calendars in one click. Instead of complex Google Calendar API configurations, Styled Calendar uses a simple Google authorization popup. Just select your Google account and click “Continue” – then leave the rest to us.

📣 Embed with a Shortcode

Just copy your calendar’s shortcode and paste it anywhere on your site to display your fully customized calendar.

🎨 Fine-Grained Control

Use over eighty settings to customize your calendar’s colors, typography, language, layout, and more – all without writing a single line of code.

📱 Mobile Responsive Design

Support both desktop and mobile devices beautifully. Styled Calendar is optimized for all screen sizes out of the box. All settings can be varied by screen size, allowing mobile views to be customized completely independently of desktop views.

🧑‍💻 Developer Friendly

If you’re a developer, you can use your skills to extend Styled Calendar even further. Add custom CSS for limitless flexibility and control.

🌎 Support for More Than Sixty Languages and Regions

We give you fine-grained control over all of the text that appears on your calendars. This means that Styled Calendar can be used with almost any language. Quick select from the top 10 languages in the world, or customize your calendar’s text manually to support less common languages.

⏰ Always Up-To-Date

Styled Calendar continually synchronizes events from your Google Calendars, so your end users are always kept up-to-date. Add, remove, or update events on Google Calendar and your changes will be reflected on your embedded calendar immediately.

🆓 Free for Most Users

By leveraging more than sixty free preferences, the vast majority of our users design and embed their calendars at no cost. These features are completely free – forever.

Want to go above and beyond? Our premium plan costs $10 per month and enables access to all of Styled Calendar’s features.

Free Plan

  • Instant Event Syncing
  • Mobile-Responsive Design (Support for Desktop and Mobile Devices)
  • Calendar Language (Select from More Than 60 Languages and Regions)
  • Embed with an HTML Snippet
  • Accent Colors
  • Background Colors
  • Borders and Spacing
  • Font Family, Size, Weight, and Color
  • Button Colors, Borders, and States
  • Unlimited Calendar Embeds
  • Unlimited Google Calendars Combined on a Single Calendar Embed
  • Calendar Time Zone
  • Custom First Day of the Week

Premium Plan ($10 per Month)

  • All features from the Free Plan
  • Custom CSS
  • Differentiate Google Calendars by Color
  • Remove “Powered By Styled Calendar” Button
  • Custom Calendar Layouts
  • Custom Header and Footer Layouts
  • Hidden Days of the Week
  • Custom Initial Date
  • Limited Date Range
  • Week Numbers
  • Custom Title Format
  • Click on an Event to Open its Location (Opens Google Maps or a URL-Based Location Directly)
  • Click on an Event to Copy it to the User’s Google Calendar
  • Click on an Event to Open a Custom URL
  • Event Call to Action Button
  • Event Attachments
sections.faq:
Does this plugin connect my site to an external service?

Yes, Styled Calendar is a stand-alone application that syncs events from Google Calendars and displays them beautifully and flexibly on any website. This plugin connects Styled Calendar to WordPress, making it even easier to embed customized Google Calendars into WordPress sites. Styled Calendar can also be used without this plugin.

sections.screenshots:
1. The standard grid layout in our calendar editor

  2. A list layout on desktop devices

  3. The standard list layout on a mobile device

  4. The time grid week layout

  5. Setting the accent color edits a number of settings at once, each of which can be set individually

  6. Quick select from the top 10 languages in the world, or customize your calendar’s text manually to support less common languages

  7. Update the calendar's font families

  8. Edit the layout of the calendar's header and footer

  9. Event overlays are triggered on click and can be customized in a large number of ways

  10. Events can be color coded by which Google calendar they are pulled from

  11. Add custom CSS to fit your exact needs

  12. Include events from one or many Google calendars
sections.reviews:
So far, so good! Exaclty what we needed.

By wordHab on February 26, 2024

Started using this plugin last week and so far really like it! We'd been using a system that had grown way more sophisticated and expensive for our needs, we'd looked at a number of alternatives but once we came across Style Calendar it was an easy choice to make.

Well designed UI, easy customizations and good support.

Excellent product and service

By stanabc on February 20, 2024

I run a board game café hosting 8-10 events each week, and needed a way to display an events calendar on our website. The best option for us has been to automatically pull data from our ticketing platform, add it to a Google Calendar, then embed this on the website.

Embedded Google Calendars are ugly, and Styled Calendar has let us make a very functional calendar which looks good and fits our brand.

On top of this, I had a very specific technical question which I sent via their chat bot and received a reply within 24 hours offering two possible solutions which perfectly addressed my issue. Great service!

The free version is limited, but still much better than a standard Google Calendar embed, and the pricing for the premium version is very reasonable for a business use case.

Great plugin, great support

By misterplum on February 9, 2024

This is exactly what I was looking for: a way to transform the clunky Google Calendar embed into a fluid and elegant experience. Since I'm a web designer, I'm using the paid version which lets you style CSS at will and other options.

I was pleasantly surprised by the customer support, who answers very quickly with efficient solutions – I can see this plugin was made by a passionate person, which is nice and makes customer support much more efficient.

I don't understand those who complain about having fewer options in the free version – what about remunerating the author for their hard work? Sure, I would prefer a lifetime access option because monthly subscriptions are the costliest solution, but I'm happy to support good developers.

Best free option to style Google calendar

By martinludvik on January 29, 2024

I have found that this is the best free option to style Google calendar. Yes, there are limitations to a free plan, but even if you would leave it as default it is still way better than plain embedded Google calendar. Also, their support team answers quickly and seems to listen to feedback.

Very limited styling options in free version

By username201701 on October 27, 2023

I downloaded this plugin to enable me to change the default styling of the Google calendar in "agenda" mode. I watched the intro video on the plugin page and nearly every feature is premium. Misleading.

An elegant solution for Google calendars

By vingogly on August 11, 2023

I want to get away from The Event Calendar and tried a few of the Google Calendar embed options. This is the only one where I can easily integrated a Google Calendar into the look and feel of a site, and my client loves the look.

Love it. Very Easy to Use

By wt5x on August 5, 2023

I love this plugin. Very easy to use. Customizable, Looks good on my site. I recommend.

Seamless and beautiful UI

By fiestacommunity on July 31, 2023

The best of Google Calendar with an incredibly flexible set of controls to make the calendar look native to your website.

Fantastic Calendar!

By goldenorange on April 26, 2023

I've been bothered by the lack of calendar design that Google calendar offers, which has no customization. I luckily stumbled upon Styled Calendar and it has so many amazing options! Tons of great customization tools and details I would have never thought to change before. This has enhanced my website to a much more pleasing calendar to look at.

Also the customer service is great if you ever have any questions.

I highly recommend trying this out!

User-Friendly and Easy To Setup

By Ricky (rickyc) on April 25, 2023

Because of Google Calendar's lack of customization options, we were stuck with a poor UI and UX. That was until we found this awesome plugin. It was very easy and quick to setup. All we had to do was connect our google calendar and then we could customize the calendar to our liking. It created a much better UI and UX for the users visiting our pages!
